## View interface

A simple interface for providing a few APIs which a tree must have.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface View<T> extends RootNode<T> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [RootNode](./treex.js.rootnode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [root](./treex.js.view.root.md) | [ViewNode](./treex.js.viewnode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | A root node in this tree |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [onSelectionChange()](./treex.js.view.onselectionchange.md) | selection events captured by all nodes |
|  [onUpdated()](./treex.js.view.onupdated.md) | update events captured by all nodes |
|  [onVisibilityChange()](./treex.js.view.onvisibilitychange.md) | visibility events captured by all nodes |
